translations: n．变节，背教：放弃或背离原有的信仰、政治信仰或原则。
· The church was shocked by the apostasies of some of its members.
教会对一些成员的变节感到震惊。

sentences.sentence: Probably the most shocking element in these inspired statements is the revelation about the number of apostasies.
sentences.translation: 或许在这些灵感之言中最令人震惊的成分就是关于背道数量的启示。

sentences.sentence: Everyone who goes out of them will be torn in pieces, Because their transgressions are many, their apostasies are numerous.
sentences.translation: 凡出城的、必被撕碎。因为他们的罪过极多、背道的事也加增了。
